entry.title: My first blog
entry.summary: So excited now, it takes me four days to build this whole site. This site is hosted on Github, powered by hakyll which is written in haskell. I like to use termal(console) rather than GUI, tmux, mutt, irssi is my favorite. Iâ€™ll main post technical sharings here about Linux, programing languages and Virtualization/Cloud related things. Tweet me up at @shi2wei3
